lead_paragraph: The state rested in the penalty phase of the trial against Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who was convicted in the 2013 Boston bombings. The defense will begin trying to spare Mr. Tsarnaev’s life Monday.

headline.print_headline: Prosecution in Boston Lets Victims Cap Case
headline.main: Boston Marathon Prosecution Lets Victims Cap Case

snippet: The state rested in the penalty phase of the trial against Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who was convicted in the 2013 Boston bombings. The defense will begin trying to spare Mr. Tsarnaev’s life Monday.
abstract: Federal prosecutors call victims to stand as they try to persuade jury to sentence Dzhokhar Tsarnaev to death for Boston marathon bombings.
